events.name: EU production and diversification of supply
events.wd_label: EU production and diversification of supply
events.wd_description: Total battery consumption in the EU will almost reach 400 GWh in 2025 (and 4 times more in 2040), driven by use in e-mobility (about 60% of the total capacity in 2025, and 80% in 2040).
events.description: Total battery consumption in the EU will almost reach 400 GWh in 2025 (and 4 times more in 2040), driven by use in e-mobility (about 60% of the total capacity in 2025, and 80% in 2040).

events.name: EU expansion of production base for battery raw materials and components
events.wd_label: EU expansion of production base for battery raw materials and components
events.wd_description: The EU is expected to expand its production base for battery raw materials and components over 2022-2030, and improve its current position and global share.
events.description: The EU is expected to expand its production base for battery raw materials and components over 2022-2030, and improve its current position and global share.

events.name: Import dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain
events.wd_label: Import dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain
events.wd_description: However, dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain will remain creating vulnerabilities.
events.description: However, dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain will remain creating vulnerabilities.

events.name: EU self-sufficiency in manganese
events.wd_description: The EU is likely to be self-sufficient in both primary and refined raw materials.
events.description: The EU is likely to be self-sufficient in both primary and refined raw materials.

events.name: EU imports of cobalt and nickel concentrates and intermediates
events.wd_label: EU imports of cobalt and nickel concentrates and intermediates
events.wd_description: The EU will continue to be dependent on imports of cobalt and nickel (concentrates and intermediates) for the production of battery raw materials.
events.description: The EU will continue to be dependent on imports of cobalt and nickel (concentrates and intermediates) for the production of battery raw materials.

events.name: EU production of lithium-ion batteries
events.wd_description: Total battery consumption in the EU will almost reach 400 GWh in 2025 (and 4 times more in 2040), driven by use in e-mobility (about 60% of the total capacity in 2025, and 80% in 2040).
events.description: Total battery consumption in the EU will almost reach 400 GWh in 2025 (and 4 times more in 2040), driven by use in e-mobility (about 60% of the total capacity in 2025, and 80% in 2040).

events.name: EU diversification of supply sources
events.wd_description: The EU is expected to expand its production base for battery raw materials and components over 2022-2030, and improve its current position and global share.
events.description: The EU is expected to expand its production base for battery raw materials and components over 2022-2030, and improve its current position and global share.

events.name: Import dependencies in the supply chain
events.wd_label: Import dependencies in the supply chain
events.wd_description: However, import dependencies in the supply chain will remain creating vulnerabilities.
events.description: However, import dependencies in the supply chain will remain creating vulnerabilities.

events.name: Bottlenecks in the supply chain
events.wd_description: Dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain will remain creating vulnerabilities.
events.description: Dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain will remain creating vulnerabilities.

events.name: Supply diversification
events.wd_description: The EU aims to diversify its supply sources for critical battery materials such as cobalt, nickel, lithium, and graphite to reduce dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain.
events.description: The EU aims to diversify its supply sources for critical battery materials such as cobalt, nickel, lithium, and graphite to reduce dependencies and bottlenecks in the supply chain.

events.name: Cobalt and nickel import
events.wd_description: The EU will continue to depend on imports of cobalt and nickel for conversion in its refineries.
events.description: The EU will continue to depend on imports of cobalt and nickel for conversion in its refineries.

events.name: Lithium self-sufficiency
events.wd_description: The EU will primarily source inputs for producing refined lithium compounds from new lithium mines within the EU.
events.description: The EU will primarily source inputs for producing refined lithium compounds from new lithium mines within the EU.

events.name: Graphite import reliance
events.wd_description: The refining of natural graphite for anodes will depend on both domestic production and imports.
events.description: The refining of natural graphite for anodes will depend on both domestic production and imports.

events.name: Manganese self-sufficiency
events.wd_description: The EU is likely to be self-sufficient in both primary and refined manganese raw materials.
events.description: The EU is likely to be self-sufficient in both primary and refined manganese raw materials.
